episodes.title: Why is Mica Miller's Church Hiding This Sermon? | Part 3 | #justiceformica
episodes.description:
This is part 3 of an exclusive review of the sermon hidden from the world. Solid Rock Church at Market Common Church in Myrtle Beach, SC deleted this sermon shortly after the news of Mica Miller's death went nationwide. I believe they did that to hide Pastor JP Miller's body language and behavior in this sermon and to hide from further scrutiny.

Thanks to a whistleblower, however, we have the full deleted sermon. Please join me as I walk through the sermon JP Miller preached the morning he announced his estranged wife's death. We'll look specifically for red flags of deception, manipulation, and other behavior that might shed some light on the tragic death of Mica Miller. 

Watch Part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D1rLwAbnPME 
Watch Part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nggM_rGqKYE

Church Historian Russell Kelly Re: Hebrews 7 and Tithing: https://www.tithing-russkelly.com/hebrews-7-extremely-important/ 

Shawn McCraney's Expository Teachings in Hebrews - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YfgIkHYF1Kg&list=PLC32FE4B28369B466&index=1

The Truth About Tithing - https://www.checkmychurch.org/post/what-is-tithing-the-truth-about-tithing

episodes.title: Cult Love-Bombing at Mica Miller's Former Church | #justiceformica
episodes.description:
For this episode, we're talking to a former member of Solid Rock Church at Market Common in Myrtle Beach, SC, Allicia Young, for the second time. In this discussion, we talk about the cult practice of love-bombing and the many ways Allicia and her husband experienced this tactic while attending Solid Rock church.

To learn more about Check My Church, visit our website at checkmychurch.org and subscribe to our social media pages on Facebook and Instagram to stay updated on all our current investigations and observations. 

https://www.facebook.com/checkmychurch
https://www.instagram.com/check_my_church/
